General.Name: Formosa Laboratories Inc
General.Description: Formosa Laboratories, Inc. produces and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) worldwide. The company offers APIs in the areas of anticancer, anti-inflammatory and analgesic agents, MRI enhancing agents, cholesterol and phosphate binders, CNS agents, immunomodulators, respiratory agents, steroids, vitamin D derivatives, and antibiotics. It also provides contract development and manufacturing services; solutions for manufacturing antibody-drug conjugates; and injectable manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
